title: just faced a hacked nasus
body: he had 550 stacks on his q by 30 mins. there is no legit way he has that many. he was constantly harassed in lane and i managed to kill him a couple times. yet he simply was getting q stacks seeming at a steady rate. i reported him. i hope he gets permanently banned. im sick of hackers in league. its why i mainly play dota. fewer hackers if any.
